name: root
description: This is a sandbox testing project, it does nothing; ignore this please

scripts.prep: node prep.js && git commit -a -m "test cycle" && git push
scripts.version:patch: lerna version patch && lerna publish from-git
scripts.version:minor: lerna version minor && lerna publish from-git
scripts.version:major: lerna version major && lerna publish from-git
scripts.release:prepatch: npm run prep && npm run canary:patch
scripts.release:preminor: npm run prep && npm run canary:minor
scripts.release:patch: npm run prep && npm run version:patch
scripts.release:minor: npm run prep && npm run version:minor
scripts.release:major: npm run prep && npm run version:major

author: iggykogan
